title: An Answer to unconstant William, or, The Young-man's resolution to pay the young lasses in their own coin.
publisher: Printed for C. Bates, next door to the Crown-Tavern in West-Smithfield.,
notes: "Tune is, Here I love, there I love, &c."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
